column5: Any idea where i can buy a rechargeable 6 volt alkaline battery? I checked Canadian tires web site and they just have duracell 6 volt. Need it for my trail camera

Alkaline's are not re-chargeable as far as I know, Ni-Cad's and Lithium Ion's are. What size are you talking about, AAA, AA, C cell, D cell???? To get to six volts on your trail cam, are we talking 4 batteries???............not just one??????????
The pictire on the box looks like a soild block that says 6 volt Lantern battery  Standard or rechargable 6 volt
Specialized batteries? try the source or get the code and google for a place such as the battery stop.
As far as I know, no one makes a rechargable lantern battery. You could get one of these Battery Holders and install it in place of the lantern battery and use 4 rechargable D cells.
theres a battery shop in burlington, on fairview between walkers and guelph lines.  i believe its in the same plaza as the MTO office.
Radio Shack The Source has(had) them 6 volt NiCd, Total Battery should also have them.

There are rechargable alkaline's.  I have only seen them in AA & AAA cells.  Lantern batteries (which are about 3.5x3.5" square and about about 7" tall) are 6 volts.  They are often used for portable fish finders.  I have never seen a rechargeable one though.  If you have a 6 volt battery that is the right size.  I don't think that it will matter if it's alkaline, NiCad, Lead Acid, or Lithium Ion.  Six volts is 6 volts.  Actually, my first choice would be Lithium Ion in terms of performance.
Awesome I will have a look around tomorrow  thanks everyone.

I took apart a dead Duracell 6 V lantern battery, and inside I found 6 perfectly good Duracell D cells, it was the cheap foil and cardboard connections at top and bottom which had failed.  I know this isn't relevant, but what the hey.

You can buy rechargeable batteries in stores that sell security clothes, hardhats, goggles, steel toed boots etc.  They have 6 and 12 volt rechargeable batteries for emergency lighting systems.  Alkaline batteries are not really rechargeable.  Yes, you can put some alkaline batteries in a special charger and recharge them a bit but this must be done before the battery is dead and the fix is temporary.
